page.title: 06Ghosts 1
page.content: In Litlington people say if you run around the church,near the bungalows, after 12:00pm seven times,you wil see the devil,but I don't know if it is true. Also in Litlington there is a story about a knight on horseback.It began when a window cleaner was cleaning the windows and he saw a shadow of a knight and a horse,he told this to a vicar and the vicar went outside and saw nothing.The window cleaner was on his last window and he saw the shadow again.He went out of the church, locking the door behind him and then he saw the knight.The knight chased him he found refuge in the vicar's house because of the cross on the wall.
